Title: Relates to prohibiting establishments from refusing to accept cash as payment
Summary: Prohibits food-service and retail establishments from refusing to accept cash as payment for goods or services and calls for a civil fine if an establishment should refuse cash as payment.
LawCode: Add ยง396-ii, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting retail establishments from refusing to accept payment in cash
